title: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error".
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message appears indicating that the changes need to be saved. The user must then decide whether to save or discard the changes.
EB: The system should provide clear instructions on how to save or discard the changes when switching between the "source" and Layout views in the XML Report Designer editor. The error message should also be improved to provide more helpful information.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Edit XML code in the "source" view.
3. Switch to the Layout view.
4. Observe the error message indicating the need to save changes.
